backend/main.mo: Defines an actor with access control mixin plus a large set of geographic, installation, and proposal types, along with helper functions for creating empty geography and proposal data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature changes, affected files, components, and test IDs for UI, hero section, secretary widget, and navigation enhancements with high-confidence evidence links.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Catalog of frontend files with brief descriptions summarizing architecture docs, style guides, UI updates, React components, and supporting hooks.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Architecture document describing Whisper’s vision, hierarchical installation model, ICP canister mapping, and modular subsystem design principles.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Developer deployment guide detailing dfx configuration, deployment workflow, upgrade process, and cycle management on ICP.
frontend/docs/HOMEPAGE_REDESIGN_NOTES.md: Notes documenting the redesigned hero section, UI contrast fixes, secretary widget readability improvements, and updated typography, spacing, and effects.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Outlines multi‑phase development for Whisper, defining deliverables, non‑goals, and scaling hooks for installations and issue workflows.
frontend/docs/SECRETARY_NAVIGATION_HOOKS: Describes the registry system for registering and routing Secretary assistant navigation destinations.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Provides Whisper’s visual design rules including color palette, typography, and accessibility standards.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and theme variables for light/dark modes, including color and layout tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the root element and loading the main TSX application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling navigation registry, Secretary widget state, and UI section rendering.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: UI form for proposing new Whisper instances with location selection, name generation, and validation.
frontend/src/components/proposals/Propos: Dialog showing proposal details with admin approval/rejection actions and loading/error handling.
Displays proposal list with loading, error, and empty states, allowing users to view proposal details and statuses. Fetches proposals via useGetAllProposals and formats geography info.
frontend/src/components/secretary/Secret: Shows a dismissible card introducing the AI Secretary with a button to start a conversation. Intended as a lightweight discoverability prompt.
Implements a floating chat widget for interacting with the AI Secretary, handling messages, menu navigation, and UI state. Integrates with useSecretaryChat for message logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity changes. Automatically invalidates dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInstanceProp: Provides hooks to check instance name availability and submit new proposals to the backend. Invalidates relevant caches after successful submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Debounces a changing value by a specified delay to reduce rapid updates. Useful for delaying calls during user input.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login, persistence, and state exposure through a React context. Provides helpers for login, logout, and identity lifecycle handling.
Stores React state in localStorage with SSR safety and automatic persistence. Returns a state/value pair similar to useState.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of backend query hooks for checking relationships, fetching proposals, and verifying admin access. All queries depend on the authenticated actor from useActor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryChat.ts: Manages chat state for a secretary-style assistant, handling initialization, message addition, and option selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryNavigatio: Provides a registry for navigation destinations with keyword matching and programmatic navigation actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProposalStat: Mutation hook to update a proposal's status and invalidate related queries after success.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSGeography.ts: React Query hooks that fetch U.S. states, counties, and places from the backend with error handling and caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, including custom utilities.
frontend/src/lib/formatProposalGeography: Formats proposal geography data into readable text and provides labels for geography levels.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryNavigation.ts: Parses and creates deep links and maps keywords to navigation options for the secretary assistant.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, identity provider, and renders the main app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for getting, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling class-based dark mode, custom color tokens, extended animations, fonts, shadows, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project state file outlining UI refinement goals, hero image updates, secretary deep-linking architecture, and tracked feature requests.
